stories.Title: OpenAI wants to fund your experiment
stories.Description: In an effort to make AI a more responsible industry, OpenAI is awarding 10 grants, worth $100,000 each, to teams worldwide who develop innovative approaches to AI governance.
stories.Tweet: OpenAI wants to fund your experiment 📦 In an effort to make AI a more responsible industry, OpenAI is awarding 10 grants, worth $100,000 each, to teams worldwide who develop innovative approaches to AI governance. #openai https://openai.com/blog/democratic-inputs-to-ai

stories.Title: All aboard Search Labs
stories.Description: Google is inviting users to explore new generative AI features in Search through its Search Labs program, giving them the opportunity to sign up for experiments and discover the potential of AI.
stories.Tweet: All aboard Search Labs 📦 Google is inviting users to explore new generative AI features in Search through its Search Labs program, giving them the opportunity to sign up for experiments and discover the potential of AI. #google https://techcrunch.com/2023/05/25/google-starts-opening-up-access-to-its-new-generative-ai-capabilities-in-search/

stories.Title: Reshaping meteorology with AI
stories.Description: Atmo's AI prediction systems enhance meteorologists' capabilities by increasing performance and cutting costs.
stories.Tweet: Reshaping meteorology with AI 📦 Atmo's AI prediction systems enhance meteorologists' capabilities by increasing performance and cutting costs. #ai https://www.freethink.com/robots-ai/ai-weather-forecast

stories.Title: Two giants join forces
stories.Description: Tesla and Ford have made an electrifying announcement, revealing their collaboration to integrate the Tesla plug, NACS, into Ford's electric vehicles.
stories.Tweet: Two giants join forces 📦 Tesla and Ford have made an electrifying announcement, revealing their collaboration to integrate the Tesla plug, NACS, into Ford's electric vehicles. #tesla https://electrek.co/2023/05/25/ford-will-add-tesla-plug-to-its-electric-vehicles-in-surprising-move/

stories.Title: Everybody loves the Model Y
stories.Description: The Tesla Model Y has overtaken the Toyota Corolla in global sales rankings, making it the bestselling car worldwide in the first quarter of this year.
stories.Tweet: Everybody loves the Model Y 📦 The Tesla Model Y has overtaken the Toyota Corolla in global sales rankings, making it the bestselling car worldwide in the first quarter of this year. #tesla https://www.theverge.com/2023/5/26/23738581/tesla-model-y-ev-record-world-bestselling-car-electric

stories.Title: Hyundai teams up with LG
stories.Description: Both companies have announced plans to construct a $4.3 billion EV battery plant in Georgia (US), with the aim of boosting production and contributing to a cleaner transportation landscape.
stories.Tweet: Hyundai teams up with LG 📦 Both companies have announced plans to construct a $4.3 billion EV battery plant in Georgia (US), with the aim of boosting production and contributing to a cleaner transportation landscape. #hyundai https://electrek.co/2023/05/25/hyundai-lg-ev-battery-plant-us/

stories.Title: Neurotech history in the making
stories.Description: Neuralink, co-founded by Elon Musk, has received FDA approval for its groundbreaking clinical study. The Link brain implant aims to restore communication abilities for severe paralysis patients.
stories.Tweet: Neurotech history in the making 📦 Neuralink, co-founded by Elon Musk, has received FDA approval for its groundbreaking clinical study. The Link brain implant aims to restore communication abilities for severe paralysis patients. #neuralink https://www.cnbc.com/2023/05/25/elon-musks-neuralink-gets-fda-approval-for-in-human-study.html

stories.Title: Your next trip may be to space
stories.Description: Great news if you want to be a space tourist! After its successful test flight to suborbital space, Virgin Galactic is now gearing up to launch commercial operations in June.
stories.Tweet: Your next trip may be to space 📦 Great news if you want to be a space tourist! After its successful test flight to suborbital space, Virgin Galactic is now gearing up to launch commercial operations in June. #virgingalactic https://www.space.com/virgin-galactic-unity-25-test-flight-suborbital-space

stories.Title: TROPICS constellation is fully deployed
stories.Description: The TROPICS mission has achieved a successful conclusion as the final CubeSats enter orbit, aiming to revolutionize cyclone studies and improve hurricane forecasts.
stories.Tweet: TROPICS constellation is fully deployed 📦 The TROPICS mission has achieved a successful conclusion as the final CubeSats enter orbit, aiming to revolutionize cyclone studies and improve hurricane forecasts. #NASA https://www.nasa.gov/press-release/nasa-rocket-lab-complete-launch-of-tropics-cubesat-constellation

stories.Title: The countdown to Jupiter begins!
stories.Description: ESA's Juice mission is one step closer to Jupiter as the Flight Control Team completes the final deployments.
stories.Tweet: The countdown to Jupiter begins! 📦 ESA's Juice mission is one step closer to Jupiter as the Flight Control Team completes the final deployments.  #JUICE https://www.esa.int/Science_Exploration/Space_Science/Juice/Juice_deployments_complete_final_form_for_Jupiter

stories.Title: PROCESIO: No more manual tasks
stories.Description: This powerful platform combines no-code, low-code, and custom-code development approaches. Allowing you to integrate applications, automate workflows, and process data effortlessly.
stories.Tweet: PROCESIO: No more manual tasks 📦 This powerful platform combines no-code, low-code, and custom-code development approaches. Allowing you to integrate applications, automate workflows, and process data effortlessly. #programming https://www.producthunt.com/posts/procesio
